title: Elegant Diamond and Emerald 'Addigai' Necklace
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
G-H Color) and a central Emerald cabochon (approx. 2 carats).
features: This 'Addigai' style necklace features a rigid gold collar intricately carved with traditional floral motifs. The central pendant is a dazzling cluster of diamonds in a floral arrangement, accentuated by a vibrant Emerald. Delicately dangling gold beads add movement and charm. The design blends classic South Indian aesthetics with a modern sensibility.
colors: Primarily gold with the sparkling white of diamonds and a vibrant green Emerald accent.
occasions: and other grand occasions. A timeless piece suitable for a 'muhurtham' or a 'seemantham'. Can also be styled for sophisticated modern events.
description: This exquisite necklace combines traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. The Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster, while the brilliant diamonds add unmatched sparkle. The emerald provides a touch of regal elegance and is believed to bring prosperity. A treasured heirloom to be cherished for generations.
